with all due respect: 1. regarding his dealings with the course material, needs to be more interactive and more 'practical' on demostrations. just reading off the w3 website is not enough. instead of leaving to students all the task of practicing concepts, needs to show more demostrations in lab classes. 2. a good part of the class hour is spent on 'non-class-related' subject matter. this is good at times, not 'always'. 3. seems very rude in certain student dealings. needs to be more lenient and understanding. 4. some class policies are unnecessarily strict and harsh. e.g. there was this lab class that some people missed, and he deducted 2 or 3 attendence marks. this was completely unnecessary and ruthless. needs to be more mature in his dealings with students. again, i mean all these with all due respect. thank you.
